examples.korean: fellows in arms 발음듣기 전우. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
They were old army comrades. 발음듣기 그들은 예전에 전우였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were old army comrades. 발음

examples.korean: During the war, he fought with his comrades. 발음듣기 그 전쟁에서 그는 전우와 함께 싸웠다. Neungyule
examples.english: During the war, he fought with his comrades. 발음

examples.korean: He lost many comrades in this battle. 발음듣기 그는 이번 전투에서 많은 전우를 잃었다 Neungyule
examples.english: He lost many comrades in this battle. 발음

examples.korean: He rallied to the side of his wounded comrade. 발음듣기 그는 부상당한 전우의 곁으로 달려갔다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He rallied to the side of his wounded comrade. 발음
